chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 Pro has the above issue:
The battery is very weak. I'd like to return the phone.
Thank you for your help,

Hello ecomobile,

Just a friendly reminder that the customer is waiting for their >>refund<<.

When none of the following issues apply or when they are not correctly communicated, we would like to ask you to carry out the refund within the next 12 hours, or we will refund the order on your behalf.

1. In case of a delivery issue: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-transport-issue-lost-stolen-damaged-parcel

2. In case of a user account (e.g. iCloud, Google) still connected.
iCloud: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/What-to-do-with-a-device-locked-to-iCloud
Google: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-product-blocked-with-an-account-Android-Google

3. In case of a warranty exclusion: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/Declare-and-manage-warranty-exclusion

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!

Best regards,
Esra-Nur Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
KW
